Bind Armament.name: Bind Armament
Bind Armament.description:
You bind the weapon currently equipped in your main-hand as your Bound Armament.

While bound, you may conjure the weapon into a free hand without any resource cost. You can conjure the weapon across any distance including if it has been Disarmed.

bindArmament.name: Bind Armament
bindArmament.description: You bind the weapon currently equipped in your main-hand as your Bound Armament.

conjureArmament.name: Conjure Armament
conjureArmament.description: You call your bound armament back into your grasp. As long as you have sufficient free hands to hold it, the weapon returns instantaneously to you and is no longer Disarmed.

Dawn Beacon.name: Dawn Beacon
Dawn Beacon.description: You call forth the piercing light of dawn that penetrates the darkness around you, revealing the area and dispelling sources of magical darkness.

dawnBeacon.name: Dawn Beacon
dawnBeacon.description:
You create a pillar of magical light centered upon your current position which creates a cylinder of light creating 30 feet of bright light and an additional 30 feet of dim light. The pillar remains in place for 6 rounds or until dispelled.

This magical light counteracts magical darkness and destroys any source of magical darkness whose origin is contained within its area.

Enemies within the area when the light is first created must resist an attack against their Fortitude or be @Condition[blinded] for one round.

WIP: This spell does not yet automatically create a light source, which must be done manually for now. Eventually this will be automated using a new Foundry VTT version 14 framework for template placement.

Engulfing Darkness.name: Engulfing Darkness
Engulfing Darkness.description: You conjure an oppressive sphere of magical darkness that shrouds vision and suffocates light within its area.

engulfingDarkness.name: Engulfing Darkness
engulfingDarkness.description:
You create a sphere of magical darkness around your current position with 20 foot radius which remains in place for 6 rounds or until dispelled.

Within the area of this darkness all non-magical light sources are quenched and creatures are treated as @Condition[blinded].

The area of this sphere is constrained by solid walls. Creatures outside this area cannot see into it and the effective area of light sources outside this area ends at its perimeter.

WIP: This spell does not yet automatically create a darkness source, which must be done manually for now. Eventually this will be automated using a new Foundry VTT version 14 framework for template placement.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: A sophisticated use of Illusory magic, the Invisibility spell allows the caster to wrap light and shadow around themselves like donning a cloak, reflecting the world about them as if they were not standing there. What person wouldn't believe it when their own eyes tell them that there is nothing to see?

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.description: You become @Condition[invisible] and cannot be detected using sight-based perception. You cannot be directly targeted by any action. This spell must be Maintained in order to remain in effect.

Lifebloom.name: Lifebloom
Lifebloom.description: Few are those that can serve as a conduit within the physical world and allow the raw powers of Life and Soul to comingle, tipping the balance in their favour. This spell allows the caster to serve as a wellspring for the abundant forces that bring all soulful life into being. With a susurration of air the caster is surrounded with dancing motes of the pure energies of life and soul, like dozens of fireflies or the sparks from a fire, and a those within the radius are filled with a calming sensation as if they were immersed in pleasantly warm water. All plant life in the vicinity immediately surges through stages of growth to bloom, and the scent of pollen and lush greenery fills the air.

lifebloom.name: Lifebloom
lifebloom.description:
You channel vital magic into an aura that restores the Health and Morale of all allies within 30 feet of you. Each round, allies who start their turn within this aura recover your Wisdom in both Health and Morale. The spell must be maintained.

WIP: This spell is currently treated as an Area of Effect, granting healing-over-time effects to those within initial range. Removal of these effects if the spell ceases being maintained must be done manually for now. When auras are automated by the system in Foundry VTT version 14, the mechanical implementation of this spell will match the description.

Protective Mirage.name: Protective Mirage
Protective Mirage.description: You Aspect yourself in a mirage of shifting Illumination and Shadow which mask your current position and allow you to Elude incoming blows.

protectiveMirage.name: Protective Mirage
protectiveMirage.description: You become surrounded by three illusory duplicates which last up to 10 Rounds. Any incoming Strike against you is made with a number of Banes equal to two times your number of duplicates remaining. Each time a Strike misses you, one of your duplicates disappears.

Revive.name: Revive
Revive.description: A potent expression of Life and Control magics, Revive allows the caster to intervene in the natural process of death by driving a surge of the essence of life into the body of the recently deceased. Those who have experienced Revival are often reluctant to discuss it, but describe it as a sensation that is unpleasantly reminiscent of being woken suddenly from a deep slumber to find they have been freezing— the flesh prickles and aches, the mind reels, and the soul aches with the memory of its interrupted departure.

revive.name: Revive
revive.description: You restore a creature which has recently become @Condition[dead] back to life, reducing its Wounds by your Wisdom score. If successful, the revived creature is @Condition[disoriented] and @Condition[staggered] for 10 minutes.

Telecognition.name: Telecognition
Telecognition.description: A rudimentary example of the complex art of penetrating the minds of others, Telecognition skims thoughts from the surface of a subject's mind like leaves from the surface of a pond. Though it may not be disruptive, it is unsubtle— just as the pond ripples when its surface is touched, so too does the mind.

telecognition.name: Telecognition
telecognition.description:
You reach into the mind of a Humanoid or Giant creature, attempting to penetrate their Willpower defense to understand their thoughts and motives. The target of this spell is aware of the intrusion, even if they cannot perceive you.

If successful, the Gamemaster (in the case of an Adversary target) or Player (in the case of a Hero target) must describe to you in 3 words or less what idea or sentiment is at the forefront of their thoughts in the current moment.

Upon a Critical Success, this description may use up to 10 words to convey deeper understanding.
